backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, daily totals with branch-scoped storage (key format: branch:principal:date), balance sheet queries, and access control integration using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four white-screen crash investigation and fix features to their implementation files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend source files covering calculator, balance sheet, catalog, authentication, and print functionality with branch-scoped storage and backend integration details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with OKLCH color system (red primary hue 25, yellow accent hue 85) for light/dark modes and print media queries hiding non-bill UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with document title "Varshini Classic Cuisine" and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup (defensive null checks, fallback UI on router failure), branch authentication gate, Layout with header/nav/footer, and four routes (calculator, balance sheet, optimize bill, print view).
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches render errors and external startup failures, logging details to console and displaying CrashFallbackScreen with error info.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Landing page component that renders the branch login form and an optional Internet Identity login button, with branding and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Form component for branch authentication that accepts username and password, normalizes credentials, and calls the useBranchAuth login function.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Displays the currently logged-in branch user and provides a logout button using the useBranchAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component for Internet Identity authentication that toggles between login and logout states, clearing the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: Fallback UI component displaying error message, stack traces (error and component), environment info, and reload button that clears localStorage except preserved keys (branchAuthUser).
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Displays a banner warning that draft links may expire, with a button to copy the current URL to clipboard using the useCopyCurrentUrl hook.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Main view for displaying daily revenue totals and item quantities with day selection, plus a destructive action to clear all daily totals with confirmation and status feedback.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Custom hook that manages daily total state, fetching data from backend balance sheet API with localStorage fallback, and listens for storage changes scoped to the current branch.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: Utility functions for managing branch-scoped daily revenue ledgers and summaries in localStorage, including loading, saving, computing totals, and clearing cache.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Utility function that generates unique bill codes in format BILL-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS-XXXX with date, time, and random alphanumeric suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines CatalogItem interface and PREDEFINED_CATALOG constant containing restaurant menu items organized by categories (South Indian, North Indian, Rice, Curries, Snacks, Beverages, Desserts) with prices and stock status.
Currency and number formatting utilities using Intl.NumberFormat for INR currency display with proper thousand separators and decimal places.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Utilities for case-insensitive matching between catalog items and line items, including functions to find matching items and calculate total quantities added to bill.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: React component that displays a searchable catalog of predefined items grouped by category, with functionality to add items to bill, manage out-of-stock status, handle item images, and create new custom catalog items.
TypeScript interface definition for PredefinedItemCatalog component props, including handlers for adding, deleting, toggling stock status, and managing item images.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: React component that renders a print-only formatted bill receipt with line items table, tax/discount breakdown, and restaurant header/footer for physical printing.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: LocalStorage persistence layer for saving and retrieving bill records with branch-scoped storage, including bill format snapshots and calculation breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page component managing bill state with line items, tax, discounts, catalog integration, and actions to save bills, update ledger, and print receipts with branch authentication.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Core TypeScript type definitions for calculator feature including LineItem, CalculatorState, and CalculationBreakdown interfaces.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Calculation utilities for line items including safe number parsing, subtotal calculation, tax/discount application, and breakdown computation with validation.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Utility function that reads an image File object and converts it to a data URL string using FileReader, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/branc: Utility module that enforces fixed print location addresses for specific branch users (bachupally, nezampat), preventing user or backend overrides.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: React component page for configuring bill format defaults (receipt style, payment scan image, print location address) with special handling for fixed-branch users who cannot change their print location.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Handles loading and saving bill format defaults to branch-scoped localStorage, enforcing fixed print locations for applicable branches.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines receipt style types ('classic' and 'compact') with their metadata and default style constant.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook that manages bill format defaults, loading from localStorage on mount and saving to both localStorage and backend (if authenticated) while enforcing fixed branch addresses.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: React hook that syncs bill print location from backend user profile to branch-scoped localStorage on authentication, skipping sync for fixed-branch users.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: React component that displays a printable bill view loaded from branch-scoped storage by ID, with auto-print functionality and manual print controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: React context provider and hook for branch-based authentication with hardcoded credentials, persisting login state to localStorage and triggering data migration on login/hydration.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Custom React hook that copies the current browser URL to clipboard using modern Clipboard API with fallback to legacy execCommand, returning copy status (idle/success/error).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend canister operations including user profile management, daily totals CRUD, and balance sheet retrieval with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupFailureHand: React hook that captures and stores unhandled promise rejections and global errors during application startup for error display.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, sidebar styling, and print media styles optimized for A4 page printing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/branchScopedStorage.t: Utility functions for branch-namespaced localStorage keys with one-time migration from legacy global keys to branch-scoped storage for multi-branch data isolation.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Simple utility functions that show browser confirmation dialogs before deleting items or clearing all daily totals data.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Shim that resolves Internet Identity provider URL from Vite environment variable or defaults to production IC URL, setting process.env.II_URL for compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support, custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius variables, and plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a white screen crash bug in the deployed version, with features focused on investigating error boundaries, environment configurations, and router initialization error handling.
